name: Trigeminovascular Dysautonomia
chief_complaint: I have excruciating facial pain that comes in waves, like electric shocks, and my right eye keeps tearing up uncontrollably

lab_results.Trigeminal nerve MRI: neurovascular conflict at root entry zone

prognosis: Guarded - 60% achieve significant pain reduction with combined surgical and biological therapy, but may require multiple interventions
description: A rare neurovascular disorder characterized by paroxysmal trigeminal pain with prominent autonomic features, caused by dysregulated trigeminovascular reflexes and central sensitization. Distinct from classical trigeminal neuralgia by its autonomic component and from cluster headache by its neuropathic quality.
